assistant.title: Smart Assistant
assistant.greeting: Hello! I'm your smart assistant. How can I help you today? You can ask me about how to use the app, the menu, your order, or any other general questions.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence

settings.privacyNotice: Artificial intelligence uses locally processed data to protect your privacy.

order.title: My Order

status.sentDescription: Your order has been sent and is waiting for restaurant confirmation

status.deliveringDescription: The waiter is on the way to your table

payment.enjoyMessage: We hope you enjoyed your meal!
payment.reviewOrder: Review your order and select the payment method.
payment.assistanceMessage: If you have any questions or notice any inconsistency in your order, select «Request assistance» and an assistant will come to your table.

⚠️ You must send the order before you can pay.

Please go to 'My Order' and confirm your order first.

orderDetail.title: Order Details

orderDetail.canEditUntilKitchenAccepts: You can edit until the kitchen accepts your order. Prices may vary according to modifications.

waitlist.title: Waitlist
waitlist.scanQRDescription: Scan the QR code to join the waitlist
waitlist.changeZoneMessage: If you change zones, you will lose your current place in the waitlist for {currentZone} and will be added to the end of the list in {newZone}.
waitlist.youWillLosePosition: You will lose your current position
waitlist.willBeAddedToEnd: You will be added to the end of the new list
waitlist.disabledZonesNotice: Some zones may be disabled due to renovation, maintenance, or weather conditions
waitlist.cancelRequestMessage: If you cancel your request, you will lose your place on the waitlist and will need to make a new request if you want to join again.
waitlist.requestCancelledMessage: Your request has been successfully cancelled
waitlist.preparingTable: We are preparing your table in the {zone} section. Almost ready!
waitlist.tableForPeople: Your table for {count} {people} in the {zone} section will be ready very soon.
waitlist.exploreMenu: Explore our selection of artisan breads and specialty coffees while you wait.
waitlist.finishingCleaning: We are finishing cleaning your spot in {zone}.
waitlist.confirmedViaQR: Table for {count} {people} confirmed via QR code.
waitlist.advanceOrderSaveTime: Place your order in advance to save time
